text: Hagi Saioni kumategama vu'nea kantamimo'za tusi zavi krafa hu'naze. Na'ankure knama huhamparinte'nezama knane knanema ne'zama kre'zama nene'za mono'ma huterema nehaza knarera mago vahe'mo'e hunora ome'nea zanku anara hu'naze. Jerusalemi ran kumamofo kuma kafaramimpina vahe'mo'a marerino atiramino osigeno, pristi vahe'mo'za tusi karagi ru'naze. Ana nehazage'za Jerusalemi kumapi mofa'nemo'za zavi netazageno, Jerusalemi kumamo'a tusi'a atazampi mani'ne.
